title: Google The Best Books of 2012
description:
please excuse my slow seeding, please help me get this start :D

Google The Best Books of 2012 :  <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/books/collection/promotion_bestbooks_2012?start=0&num=24" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/books/collection/promotion_bestbooks_2012?start=0&num=24</a> -   
All those with "*" are not here :(
